name: Nodepad-learning
body:
### About.
This is my endeavor to learn node.js.I have followed the tutorial presented on dailyjs (http://dailyjs.com/2010/11/01/node-tutorial/). It is a great starting point and I really thank [Alex](http://twitter.com/#!/alex_young)  for writing this. however since the original series was started as late as 2010 some of the libraries and source code(https://github.com/alexyoung/nodepad) is a little bit outdated. I tried to correct the code after each tutorial so that others may use it.
### Dependencies
For dependencies please look package.json. 

*       "express": "2.5.6",
*       "express-resource": "0.2.4",
*       "mocha": "0.10.2",
*       "mongoose": "2.4.10",
*       "should": "0.5.1",
*        "jade": "0.20.1",
*        "zombie": "0.12.13",
*        "connect-mongodb": "1.1.3",
*        "crypto": "0.0.3",
*        "markdown": "0.3.1",
*        "stylus": "0.23.0",
*        "mailer": "0.6.7",
*        "socket-io": ">0.0.1"

### Support or Contact
contact pkmishra at the rate gmail dot com if anything is not working.
